about.title: About Us
about.teamDescription: Meet the passionate minds behind Job and Roll, committed to transforming the way people connect with opportunities
about.teamFooter: We're a passionate team dedicated to transforming how people find jobs and build their careers. Our combined expertise in technology and business drives our mission forward every day.
about.founder1Bio: Tech enthusiast passionate about creating innovative solutions that transform how people find jobs. With a background in mathematics, Leopold is our top manager.
about.founder1Quote: Technology should make job hunting easier, not harder.
about.founder2Bio: Leading our vision to build the most accessible and efficient job platform globally. With a background in physics, David leads our technology initiatives to build smarter job-matching algorithms.
about.founder2Quote: We're reimagining how people find meaningful work.
about.heroSubtitle: Building a fairer job market where everyone has equal access to opportunities.
about.founderStory: Jopoly was founded by David Mirkovic with a simple but powerful vision: job searching and hiring shouldn't cost a fortune. After seeing how expensive job platforms were excluding both job seekers and small businesses, we set out to build something different.
about.founderEducation: With a background in physics from ETH Zurich, our approach combines analytical thinking with a deep understanding of how systems can be optimized to serve people better.
about.founderQuote: Every person deserves access to great opportunities, regardless of their financial situation. We're building the platform we wish existed when we started our careers.
about.value1Desc: We believe job hunting should be free for everyone. No hidden fees, no premium barriers - just equal access to opportunities.
about.value2Desc: From retail staff to engineers, we serve people in every field. Great work comes in all forms and deserves recognition.
about.value3Desc: We're changing how the job market works by removing financial barriers and creating genuine connections between people and opportunities.
about.visionStatement: We're working every day to create a job market that puts people first. Our platform grows through word-of-mouth because we focus on delivering real value, not extracting maximum profit.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Clear guidelines for using Jopoly fairly and responsibly.
terms.summary2: We protect your rights and data
terms.section1Content:
By accessing or using Jopoly, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using our services.

These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the service, whether as job seekers or employers.

We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of our service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
terms.section2Content:
Account Registration:
• You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
• You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
• You must be at least 16 years old to use our service
• One person may not maintain multiple accounts

User Conduct:
• Use our platform honestly and professionally
• Do not post false, misleading, or discriminatory job listings or profiles
• Respect other users and maintain professional communication
• Do not use our service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
• Do not attempt to interfere with or disrupt our service
terms.section3Content:
Your Content:
• You retain ownership of content you post (resumes, job listings, profiles)
• By posting content, you grant us a license to display and distribute it on our platform
• You are responsible for ensuring your content does not violate any laws or third-party rights
• We reserve the right to remove content that violates our policies

Our Platform:
• All platform features, design, and functionality are owned by Jopoly
• You may not copy, distribute, or create derivative works from our platform
• Our name, logo, and branding are protected trademarks
terms.section4Content:
You agree not to:
• Post fake job listings or create fraudulent profiles
• Discriminate based on race, gender, age, religion, or other protected characteristics
• Spam users with unsolicited messages or applications
• Attempt to bypass our security measures or access unauthorized areas
• Use automated tools to scrape data from our platform
• Engage in any form of harassment or inappropriate behavior
• Post content that is illegal, harmful, or violates intellectual property rights

Violation of these terms may result in account suspension or termination.
terms.section5Content:
Service Provision:
• We provide our service "as is" and aim for high availability
• We do not guarantee uninterrupted access or error-free operation
• We may temporarily suspend service for maintenance or updates
• Features may be added, modified, or removed at our discretion

Limitations of Liability:
• We are not responsible for the accuracy of job listings or user profiles
• We do not guarantee job placement or hiring outcomes
• Users interact at their own risk and should verify information independently
• Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid us (which is zero for our free service)

Termination:
• Either party may terminate this agreement at any time
• We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate our terms
• Upon termination, your right to use our service ends immediately
terms.contactContent: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service or need clarification on any point, we're here to help. Contact us and we'll respond promptly.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We take your privacy seriously. Here's how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.overview1: We encrypt and secure all data
privacy.section1Content:
When you use Jopoly, we collect:

• Account Information: Name, email address, and password when you register
• Profile Data: Job preferences, skills, experience, and resume information you provide
• Job Applications: Records of jobs you apply to and save
• Usage Data: How you interact with our platform (pages visited, search terms)
• Technical Data: IP address, browser type, and device information for security and performance

We only collect information that helps us provide and improve our service.
privacy.section2Content:
We use your information to:

• Connect You with Jobs: Match your profile with relevant job opportunities
• Improve Our Service: Analyze usage patterns to enhance our platform
• Communicate: Send you job alerts, updates, and important service information
• Security: Detect and prevent fraud, spam, and abuse
• Legal Compliance: Meet our legal obligations under Swiss and EU law

We never use your data for advertising or sell it to third parties.
privacy.section3Content:
We only share your information when:

• You Apply for Jobs: Your application data is shared with employers you choose to apply to
• Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our users' safety
• Service Providers: With trusted partners who help us operate our platform (hosting, email delivery) under strict confidentiality agreements

We never sell your personal information or share it for marketing purposes.
privacy.section4Content:
Under Swiss and EU privacy laws, you have the right to:

• Access: Request a copy of all data we have about you
• Correct: Update or fix any incorrect information
• Delete: Remove your account and personal data (right to be forgotten)
• Export: Download your data in a portable format
• Object: Opt out of certain data processing activities

You can exercise these rights anytime through your account settings or by contacting us.
privacy.section5Content:
We protect your information with:

• Encryption: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest
• Secure Servers: Data stored in secure, EU-based servers
• Access Controls: Limited access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
• Regular Audits: Continuous security monitoring and testing
• Data Minimization: We only keep data as long as necessary

While no system is 100% secure, we use industry-standard practices to protect your privacy.
privacy.contactContent: Have questions about our privacy practices? Want to exercise your privacy rights? We're here to help and respond to all privacy inquiries promptly.
